uiBuilder.label: KLF UI Script Loader
uiBuilder.description: Component that will load UI Scripts from ServiceNow onto a page. Similar to a script tag. To check if the component is loading the scripts look in the console for messages that contain 'KLF UI Script Loader'

properties.name: scripts
properties.label: Scripts
properties.description: List of UI Scripts to load. The name should include the scope name. For example: x_example_scope.MyUIScript
